this_title: Kygo: Live at the Hollywood Bowl
introduction: Kygo has done it all and in seemingly no time. Hailing from Norway, he not only became the first artist to a billion streams, but he created a new genre altogether, one that is now a staple sound on the radio: tropical house. It wasn't as easy as it sounds. Beginning as a finance major, Kygo, real name Kyrre Gørvell-Dahll, played around with music as a hobby. It wasn't until he...
